instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates the K35_lpf and K35_hpf opcodes for Korg 35 filter emulation
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; K35_lpf opcode: ares K35_lpf asig, xcf, xQ [, inlp, isaturation, istor]
    ; Korg 35 lowpass filter emulation
    ; asig - input signal
    ; xcf - cutoff frequency (Hz)
    ; xQ - resonance (1-10)
    ; inlp - non-linearity amount (0-1, default 0)
    ; isaturation - saturation (0-2, default 1)
    ; istor - skip initialization (default 0)
    
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.7, 0.2
    
    ; Sawtooth source
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 110, 0
    
    ; Sweep cutoff frequency
    kCutoff expseg 200, p3*0.3, 3000, p3*0.4, 800, p3*0.3, 300
    kRes = 5
    
    ; Apply K35 lowpass filter
    aFilt K35_lpf aSaw, kCutoff, kRes, 0.5, 1.2
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 2
    ; K35_hpf opcode: ares K35_hpf asig, xcf, xQ [, inlp, isaturation, istor]
    ; Korg 35 highpass filter emulation
    
    kAmp madsr 0.015, 0.08, 0.65, 0.25
    
    ; Pulse wave
    aPulse vco2 kAmp*0.35, 165, 2, 0.3
    
    ; Sweep highpass cutoff
    kCutoff expseg 3000, p3*0.4, 400, p3*0.3, 2000, p3*0.3, 1500
    kRes = 6
    
    ; Apply K35 highpass filter
    aFilt K35_hpf aPulse, kCutoff, kRes, 0.3, 1.0
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 3
    ; High resonance K35_lpf
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.12, 0.6, 0.3
    
    ; Two detuned saws
    aSaw1 vco2 kAmp*0.2, 220, 0
    aSaw2 vco2 kAmp*0.2, 220.5, 0
    aMix = aSaw1 + aSaw2
    
    ; Fixed cutoff with high resonance
    kCutoff = 1200
    kRes linseg 3, p3*0.5, 9, p3*0.5, 4
    
    ; High saturation for analog character
    aFilt K35_lpf aMix, kCutoff, kRes, 0.7, 1.8
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

i1 0 4
i2 4.5 4
i3 9 5

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>

instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates the diode_ladder opcode for diode ladder filter emulation
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; diode_ladder opcode: ares diode_ladder asig, xcf, xk [, knlp, ksaturation, kistor]
    ; Diode ladder filter (inspired by EMS and Steiner filters)
    ; asig - input signal
    ; xcf - cutoff frequency (Hz)
    ; xk - resonance (0-17, self-oscillates above ~10)
    ; knlp - non-linearity amount (0-1)
    ; ksaturation - saturation (0-2)
    ; kistor - skip initialization
    
    kAmp madsr 0.02, 0.1, 0.65, 0.3
    
    ; Sawtooth wave
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 110, 0
    
    ; Moderate resonance sweep
    kCutoff expseg 150, p3*0.4, 2500, p3*0.6, 200
    kRes = 6
    
    aFilt diode_ladder aSaw, kCutoff, kRes, 0.5, 1.0
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 2
    ; Self-oscillating diode ladder
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.08, 0.5, 0.2
    
    ; Low-level noise excitation
    aNoise noise kAmp*0.05, 0
    
    ; High resonance for self-oscillation
    kCutoff linseg 400, p3*0.5, 1500, p3*0.5, 600
    kRes = 12
    
    aFilt diode_ladder aNoise, kCutoff, kRes, 0.3, 1.0
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 3
    ; High saturation diode ladder
    kAmp madsr 0.015, 0.12, 0.7, 0.25
    
    ; Square wave
    aSq vco2 kAmp*0.35, 165, 2
    
    ; Moderate cutoff with varying resonance
    kCutoff = 800
    kRes linseg 2, p3*0.3, 10, p3*0.4, 5, p3*0.3, 3
    
    ; High non-linearity and saturation
    aFilt diode_ladder aSq, kCutoff, kRes, 0.8, 1.6
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

i1 0 4
i2 4.5 4
i3 9 5

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>

instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates the zdf_1pole and zdf_2pole opcodes for zero-delay feedback filters
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; zdf_1pole opcode: ares zdf_1pole asig, xcf [, kmode, istor]
    ; Zero-delay feedback 1-pole filter (6 dB/oct)
    ; asig - input signal
    ; xcf - cutoff frequency (Hz)
    ; kmode - 0=lowpass, 1=highpass (default 0)
    ; istor - skip initialization
    
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.7, 0.2
    
    ; Sawtooth source
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 220, 0
    
    ; Lowpass mode
    kCutoff expseg 300, p3*0.5, 2000, p3*0.5, 400
    kMode = 0
    
    aFilt zdf_1pole aSaw, kCutoff, kMode
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 2
    ; zdf_1pole highpass mode
    kAmp madsr 0.015, 0.08, 0.65, 0.25
    
    ; Pulse wave
    aPulse vco2 kAmp*0.35, 165, 2, 0.5
    
    ; Highpass mode
    kCutoff expseg 2000, p3*0.4, 300, p3*0.6, 1500
    kMode = 1
    
    aFilt zdf_1pole aPulse, kCutoff, kMode
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 3
    ; zdf_2pole opcode: ares zdf_2pole asig, xcf, xQ [, kmode, istor]
    ; Zero-delay feedback 2-pole filter (12 dB/oct)
    ; asig - input signal
    ; xcf - cutoff frequency (Hz)
    ; xQ - resonance (0.5-25)
    ; kmode - 0=lowpass, 1=highpass, 2=bandpass, 3=bandreject, 4=allpass (default 0)
    ; istor - skip initialization
    
    kAmp madsr 0.02, 0.12, 0.6, 0.3
    
    ; Sawtooth
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 110, 0
    
    ; Lowpass with resonance
    kCutoff expseg 200, p3*0.3, 3000, p3*0.4, 600, p3*0.3, 250
    kRes = 5
    kMode = 0
    
    aFilt zdf_2pole aSaw, kCutoff, kRes, kMode
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 4
    ; zdf_2pole bandpass mode
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.55, 0.2
    
    ; Noise source
    aNoise noise kAmp*0.4, 0
    
    ; Bandpass filter
    kCenter expseg 500, p3*0.5, 2500, p3*0.5, 800
    kQ = 8
    kMode = 2
    
    aFilt zdf_2pole aNoise, kCenter, kQ, kMode
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

i1 0 3
i2 3.5 3
i3 7 4
i4 11.5 4

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>

instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates the zdf_ladder opcode for zero-delay feedback ladder filter
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; zdf_ladder opcode: ares zdf_ladder asig, xcf, xQ [, kmode, ksaturation, istor]
    ; Zero-delay feedback ladder filter (24 dB/oct Moog-style)
    ; asig - input signal
    ; xcf - cutoff frequency (Hz)
    ; xQ - resonance (0-10, self-oscillates around 10)
    ; kmode - 0=lowpass I, 1=lowpass II, 2=lowpass III, 3=lowpass IV,
    ;         4=highpass I, 5=highpass II, 6=highpass III, 7=highpass IV,
    ;         8=bandpass I, 9=bandpass II (default 0)
    ; ksaturation - saturation amount (0-3, default 1)
    ; istor - skip initialization
    
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.7, 0.2
    
    ; Sawtooth wave
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 110, 0
    
    ; Classic sweep with resonance
    kCutoff expseg 150, p3*0.3, 3500, p3*0.4, 800, p3*0.3, 200
    kRes = 7
    kMode = 0  ; Lowpass I (4-pole)
    
    aFilt zdf_ladder aSaw, kCutoff, kRes, kMode, 1.0
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 2
    ; Self-oscillating zdf_ladder
    kAmp madsr 0.015, 0.08, 0.5, 0.25
    
    ; Minimal excitation
    aNoise noise kAmp*0.03, 0
    
    ; High resonance
    kCutoff linseg 300, p3*0.5, 2000, p3*0.5, 500
    kRes = 9.5
    kMode = 0
    
    aFilt zdf_ladder aNoise, kCutoff, kRes, kMode, 1.0
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 3
    ; Bandpass mode
    kAmp madsr 0.02, 0.12, 0.6, 0.3
    
    ; Pulse wave
    aPulse vco2 kAmp*0.35, 165, 2, 0.4
    
    ; Bandpass filter
    kCenter expseg 400, p3*0.4, 2500, p3*0.6, 700
    kQ = 6
    kMode = 8  ; Bandpass I
    
    aFilt zdf_ladder aPulse, kCenter, kQ, kMode, 1.2
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 4
    ; High saturation zdf_ladder
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.65, 0.2
    
    ; Square wave
    aSq vco2 kAmp*0.3, 220, 2
    
    ; Moderate sweep with high saturation
    kCutoff expseg 300, p3*0.5, 1800, p3*0.5, 500
    kRes = 6.5
    kMode = 0
    
    ; High saturation for warmth
    aFilt zdf_ladder aSq, kCutoff, kRes, kMode, 2.5
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

i1 0 4
i2 4.5 4
i3 9 4
i4 13.5 4

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>

instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates the mvchpf family of opcodes for highpass filtering
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; mvchpf opcode: ares mvchpf asig, xcf [, istor]
    ; 4-pole highpass filter (24 dB/oct)
    ; asig - input signal
    ; xcf - cutoff frequency (Hz)
    ; istor - skip initialization
    
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.7, 0.2
    
    ; Pulse wave with rich harmonics
    aPulse vco2 kAmp*0.35, 110, 2, 0.3
    
    ; Sweep highpass cutoff
    kCutoff expseg 2000, p3*0.4, 200, p3*0.6, 1500
    
    aFilt mvchpf aPulse, kCutoff
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 2
    ; mvchpf1 opcode: ares mvchpf1 asig, xcf [, istor]
    ; 1-pole highpass filter (6 dB/oct)
    
    kAmp madsr 0.015, 0.08, 0.65, 0.25
    
    ; Sawtooth
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 165, 0
    
    ; Gentle highpass
    kCutoff expseg 1500, p3*0.5, 300, p3*0.5, 1000
    
    aFilt mvchpf1 aSaw, kCutoff
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 3
    ; mvchpf2 opcode: ares mvchpf2 asig, xcf [, istor]
    ; 2-pole highpass filter (12 dB/oct)
    
    kAmp madsr 0.02, 0.12, 0.6, 0.3
    
    ; Square wave
    aSq vco2 kAmp*0.3, 220, 2
    
    ; Medium highpass
    kCutoff expseg 1800, p3*0.3, 400, p3*0.4, 1200, p3*0.3, 800
    
    aFilt mvchpf2 aSq, kCutoff
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 4
    ; mvchpf3 opcode: ares mvchpf3 asig, xcf [, istor]
    ; 3-pole highpass filter (18 dB/oct)
    
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.55, 0.2
    
    ; Pulse wave
    aPulse vco2 kAmp*0.35, 165, 2, 0.5
    
    ; Steep highpass
    kCutoff expseg 2500, p3*0.5, 350, p3*0.5, 1800
    
    aFilt mvchpf3 aPulse, kCutoff
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 5
    ; mvchpf4 opcode: ares mvchpf4 asig, xcf [, istor]
    ; Same as mvchpf (4-pole, 24 dB/oct)
    
    kAmp madsr 0.015, 0.08, 0.65, 0.25
    
    ; Sawtooth
    aSaw vco2 kAmp*0.3, 110, 0
    
    ; Very steep highpass
    kCutoff expseg 3000, p3*0.4, 250, p3*0.6, 2000
    
    aFilt mvchpf4 aSaw, kCutoff
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 6
    ; Compare different slopes
    kAmp madsr 0.01, 0.1, 0.6, 0.2
    
    ; Rich source
    aPulse vco2 kAmp*0.25, 220, 2, 0.4
    
    ; Same cutoff for all
    kCutoff expseg 1500, p3*0.5, 400, p3*0.5, 1200
    
    ; Different slopes
    aFilt1 mvchpf1 aPulse, kCutoff  ; 6 dB/oct
    aFilt2 mvchpf3 aPulse, kCutoff  ; 18 dB/oct
    
    outs aFilt1, aFilt2
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

i1 0 3
i2 3.5 3
i3 7 3
i4 10.5 3
i5 14 3
i6 17.5 4

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>
